CustomProfile.Description: 3D Cosplay Mahjong is an adult‑themed strip mahjong game released exclusively in Japanese arcades. Players customize a 3D model of their opponent and compete in rounds of Riichi mahjong; winning hands gradually remove layers of clothing from the opponent. The game combines traditional mahjong rules with risqué 3D character models and unlocking outfits, making it a mature spin on the classic tile game.
